text: , also known as , was a very old province of Japan, in the area of Chikuzen and Chikugo provinces.Satow, Ernest. (1874). "The Geography of Japan," Transactions of the Asiatic Society of Japan, Vol. 1-2, p. 35. This province was located within Fukuoka Prefecture.Nussbaum, Louis-Frédéric. (2005).
